title: Saucer, 1953-17-89-a,b
provenance: Bought of Princeton Univ. Museum in 1925, paid $3. Ex coll. Prime-Trumbell. McClellan number: 381
description: Curved, tall cup, with slightly flaring edge. Saucer curved. Figures and animals in landscape in polychrome relief on both cup and saucer. Scrolled band on base and inner edge of cup. Gold rim.
